Articles.Content:
Hi,

Just to tell everyone that we've released a hotfix (0.8.2) just now.

It should cover the more serious bugs that were reported in these last few hours.

Cheers
i got it,and i love it,keep up the good work

here is a link for all you lazy folk !

http://www./?pri1ehlccbyvr51
I'm curious, did you change anything about the physics and rocket integrity? Because my rocket which used to be stable in 0.8.1 now breaks apart at launch.

No... none of that has even been touched in the 0.8.2 fix...

But there were a couple of changes in the .8.1 release, which could take a while to get used to.

Cheers

First off, downloaded the game a couple of days ago and have loved it.

But with this latest update, it's become pretty much unplayable. Whenever I click a tab in the vehicle creation mode I seem to have a 50/50 chance of crashing, is there some kind of bug I don't know about?

Here are the files from one of the crash reports:

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/11763907/KSP/crash.dmp

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/11763907/KSP/error.log

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/11763907/KSP/output_log.txt

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/11763907/KSP/report.ini

I am having some major trouble in the vehicle creation center as well. I keep getting to a state where a symmetry attachment fails and then I can't fix it. It won't let me grab a new piece, or dispose of the piece I am currently holding.

I am having some major trouble in the vehicle creation center as well. I keep getting to a state where a symmetry attachment fails and then I can't fix it. It won't let me grab a new piece, or dispose of the piece I am currently holding.

I am getting the same problem. It seems to happen when stacking objects using symmetry, but one to three objects are never placed.
